Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2017 09:35PM Cal1960 wrote: I had prophylactic( mascetomy) a preventive surgery..without reconstruction 12/9/16 I have 2 bulges one under each arm feels like having a football under my arms at times an my chest feels like I'm wearing a chest plate an one arm mobility is very difficult . .my doctor said the dog ears can be fixed after I've done therapy to see if it'll help lay it down...has anyone had it lay down after therapy or does it? does the tightness go away?...I don't regret having the surgery but I just wish they would of prepared me for what to expect..
